# About me
Welcome to my professional web page. 

I am Sivakumar Balasubramaniam, lecturer in Bioengineering at the Christian Medical College Vellore. I have been with the department since August 2014, after having worked as researcher at Tecnalia Research and Innovation, San Sebastian, Spain.

# Research
